scripts.name: Auto Play (Funky Friday)
scripts.description:
After the game starts, press F1 if you are in the left area, or press F2 if you are in the right area. To stop, press F3.
F1 left zone
F2 Rİght zone
F3 Enable/Disable AutoPlay
